subject: newbie Qs
msgSnippet: Hi, I have written a method which displays integers on the screen (its a for loop and i have a println statement in it). can i create a junit test case for
messageBody:
Hi,

I have written a method which displays integers on the screen (its a
for loop and i have a println statement in it).

can i create a junit test case for this method? if so how do i check
the correct output.

also how do i create a test case to check the command line params
passed.


Can some one also guide me to where i can find tutorials, articles on
junit?

TIA
Radiya
